title: Chapter One
description: East Ender Tony dreamed of being a jockey but became a taxi driver instead. He reveals what he has been up to since aged 7, along with a few other people that have been part of this study since aged 7, and for every 7 years.

title: Chapter Two
description: While he was growing up, Bruce wanted to become a missionary in Africa, but instead chose to be a teacher in the UK.

title: Chapter Three
description: Paul and Simon have an emotional reunion in Australia, and a catch up with Neil, who was found homeless in 28 Up.
